typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		OrderDetailID as string,
		OrderID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		UnitCost as decimal(10,0),
		LineNumber as integer,
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source2
source(output(
		OrderID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		OrderDate as date,
		ShipDate as date,
		TotalCost as decimal(10,0),
		CreatedDate as date,
		UpdatedDate as date
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source3
source3 derive(SouceSystemID = 1) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1, source2 join(source3@OrderID == source2@OrderID,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 derive(GlobalOrderID = uuid()) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	mapColumn(
		OrderID = source3@OrderID,
		CustomerID,
		OrderDate,
		ShipDate,
		TotalCost,
		CreatedDate = source3@CreatedDate,
		UpdatedDate = source3@UpdatedDate,
		SouceSystemID,
		OrderDetailID,
		OrderDetailOrderID = source2@OrderID,
		MovieID,
		Quantity,
		UnitCost,
		LineNumber,
		OrderDetailCreatedDate = source2@CreatedDate,
		OrderDetailUpdatedDate = source2@UpdatedDate,
		GlobalOrderID
	)) ~> SaveTOdls
